author: Eva Dou
title: Infrared cameras, personal towels: China factories go to extremes to fend off virus
description: Chinese companies are reopening with tight rules for preventing second-wave coronavirus infections.
content:
The stakes are high for China, economically and politically. After Beijings leaders declared victory over the virus, a relapse would be humiliating. Worse, it could tip China and the world into economic recession.
Since businesses began reopening in February… [+7198 chars]
